document_data.name: The Bold Archer
document_data.mainbody: '''The Bold Archer''' was a club on the [[Promenade (Suzail)|Promenade]] in [[Suzail]], the capital city of [[Cormyr]] in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The entrance to the Bold Archer was marked with a carved hanging sign depicting a calm woman on a forest rock wielding a [[bow]] against a pack of [[wolves]]. The club's two sets of heavy doors were made out of [[copper]]-sheathed [[duskwood]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1479}}, the Bold Archer became a site of a murder. Two ghostly warriors clad in blue flames murdered Lord [[Seszgar Huntcrown]] It was later discovered by [[Storm Silverhand]], the Marchioness of [[Immerdusk]], that these [[blueflame ghost]]s were under the control of Lord [[Marlin Stormserpent]].{{cite book/Bury Elminster Deep|118|12}}
